name: Gylt
summary: Face your fears in GYLT, a haunting tale about bullying and childhood nightmares, as you help Sally navigate a creepy world to rescue her missing cousin Emily. GYLT is available only on Stadia!
info:
• 平台: Google Stadia
  • 游戏类型: Horror
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019年11月19日
  • 官方网站: http://www.gyltthegame.com/
  • 开发: Tequila Works
  • 发行: Tequila Works
